item.title: Encuentro de usuarios R en Canarias
item.description: Nada me complace más que iniciar esta nueva web y blog anunciando que el próximo 25 de marzo se llevará a cabo la primera reunión de usuarios de R –#rstats– en Canarias. El encuentro se realizará en la Sociedad de Promoción Económica de Gran Canaria durante todo el día y estará organizado por el también reciente grupo de usuarios de R en Canarias. La inscripción y propuesta de charlas (!

item.title: Encuentro de usuarios R en Canarias
item.description: The first thing I’d recommend to anyone who wants to build a website from R using blogdown is to read the book of the author of this package, Yihui Xie. Therefore, this post isn’t intended to be a guide on how to make your own website but a way to tell my experience through the process. The details of what each folder should contain within the project are fully and very well explained on the book linked above.

item.title: About me / Sobre mí
item.description: Born and raised in Gran Canaria, the Canary Islands, in northwest Africa. I graduated in Economics at University of Las Palmas de Gran Canaria with a MSc in Statistics at Polytechnic University of Catalonia in the lovely Barcelona (2017). On the professional side, I am currently working as a Data Scientist at Kernel Analytics. I am a R enthusiast as well as interested in Statistics, Economics, Politics and… a devoted supporter of my football team, UD Las Palmas.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Feel free to contact me through my email.
